metadata.title: CVE-2023-4051 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A website could have obscured the full screen notification by using thefile open dialog. This could have led to user confusion and possiblespoofing attacks. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 116, Firefox ESR <115.2, and Thunderbird < 115.2.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4051` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 116.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.2
firefox-geckodriver - 116.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 116.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '116.0+build2-0ubuntu0.20.04.2').
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
